steps: step 3: Click on link w4Wams4TestCases -> Navigate to page 'team/*/project/*'

step 8: Click on link reports -> Navigate to page 'team/*/project/*/overview'

step 10: Click on link dashboard -> Navigate to page 'team/*/project/*'
step 11: Take full page screenshot as checkpoint
